list_definition.definition: food used to attract fish, animals etc which one wishes to catch, kill etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Before he went fishing, he dug up some worms for bait.

list_definition.definition: to put bait on or in (a hook, trap etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He baited the mousetrap with cheese.
